answers.answer: Yes I'll be 33weeks Wednesday,due date August 5th I go through it every day... just know that we're almost there
Thats what keeps me goin. Geez i cant wait

I'm due August 9th... Been sick with pneumonia, bad nausea, sciatic nerve on the right side flairs up regularly and my hips hurt when I try to get up from sitting or laying down.  It's been... Rough... But I can't wait to meet my little one.  :-)

I'm due Aug 8th....sciatica, sore hips, low back pain, contractions,dehydration and vaginal pain that feels like I was kicked. I'm huge, baby is big and I'm miserable. Now to find out my BP is high so being monitored for preeclampsia. I had no issues with my first bit this one is kicking my butt. I just want my baby girl to be here!
Exactly ladies. I jus want my princess. We dont have long tho. That sciatic pain and hip pain aint no joke
Yes, I'm 31 week and I have low back pain and lots of contractions everyday and I'm due August 18

question: Currently 32 weeks. This has been a horrible pregnancy. Extreme nauaea, sciatic nerve pain, hip problems and the list goes on. Anyone else feel my pain??
title: due august 11
